name: Love Inc.
description:
Controls and instructions explained in the game. Enjoy and don't forget to rate!

Wasn't able to finish everything in time but at least it's playable. Also sorry for the lack of audio, am not much of a sound guy myself.

Fix update after the jam ended changelog: (2019/02/23)

# Money display now updates after purchasing next level.

# Inaccuracy in tutorial removed (text correction).

# Tweaked some previous level variables.

# Added few more levels.
